content: Funny. When I worked at Ersnt & Young I was required to interview people. The person woild come in and give me their resume. I would say, “You have successfully passed allot steps to reach me. Let’s understand who you are”. I would ask questions like, “what was your favourite Xmas” or “what would you do with $1 million dollars”. The answers were not that important but the dialogue and different branches from the question were really critical. Really enoyed your article. Thank you.
